dimensions.label: Moral Compass
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach complex moral issues?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize strict adherence to rules and norms, even if it means compromising individual freedom or happiness.
Your FarTwin will approach moral issues with a flexible and adaptable mindset, considering multiple perspectives and potential consequences before making a decision.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle uncertain or high-risk situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach uncertain or high-risk situations with caution, weighing potential risks and benefits carefully before making a decision.
Your FarTwin will seek out uncertain or high-risk situations as opportunities for growth and excitement, often taking bold action even in the face of uncertainty.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach complex problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach complex problems using a logical and analytical mindset, breaking down complex issues into smaller parts to understand and solve them.
Your FarTwin will approach complex problems using an intuitive and creative mindset, looking for innovative solutions that might not be immediately apparent through analysis alone.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express and manage their emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will openly express and manage their emotions, using verbal and nonverbal cues to communicate their feelings and needs.
Your FarTwin will reserve their emotional expression, managing their emotions in private and only revealing them to those they trust or feel are worthy of vulnerability.

dimensions.label: Collaboration Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin collaborate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach collaboration as a competitive endeavor, seeking to outdo and outshine their peers in order to achieve success.
Your FarTwin will approach collaboration as a cooperative effort, working together with others to achieve common goals and share knowledge and expertise.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin learn new information or skills?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn best through hands-on experience, preferring to experiment and practice rather than simply reading or listening about a subject.
Your FarTwin will learn best through theoretical understanding, preferring to study and analyze concepts before applying them in practical situations.

dimensions.label: Sense of Humor
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach humor?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach humor with sarcasm, using irony and ridicule to comment on the absurdity or humor in a situation.
Your FarTwin will approach humor with playfulness, using lighthearted and affectionate language to bring joy and amusement to themselves and others.

dimensions.label: Risk of Conflict
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin navigate potential conflicts or disagreements?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach potential conflicts with aggression, using direct confrontation and assertive language to resolve disputes.
Your FarTwin will approach potential conflicts with diplomacy, seeking to understand the other person's perspective and finding mutually beneficial solutions through negotiation and compromise.
